meanings.definition: A light, smooth fabric made of silk, cotton, or synthetic fibers.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful mousseline dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: The curtains in the living room were made of delicate mousseline.
meanings.sent3: The mousseline scarf floated in the breeze like a gentle cloud.
meanings.sent4: Her words were as light and airy as a piece of mousseline.
meanings.sent5: The touch of the mousseline fabric was like a soft whisper on her skin.

meanings.definition: A type of sauce made with whipped cream or egg whites.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious mousseline sauce for the pasta.
meanings.sent2: The dessert was topped with a dollop of mousseline.
meanings.sent3: The mousseline sauce was so fluffy, it looked like a cloud on the plate.
meanings.sent4: Her cooking skills were as light and airy as a perfect mousseline sauce.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the mousseline sauce was like a sweet dream on his tongue.

meanings.definition: A type of dessert made with whipped cream or egg whites.
meanings.sent1: The bakery displayed a variety of mousseline desserts in the window.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed a slice of mousseline cake with her afternoon tea.
meanings.sent3: The mousseline dessert was so light, it seemed to float off the plate.
meanings.sent4: The sweetness of the mousseline dessert was like a gentle kiss on her lips.
meanings.sent5: The mousseline dessert melted in her mouth like a sweet cloud of happiness.
